item.description:
I've reserved 3 T Times for the Pinehill Jones Course on mother's day.  They have an $80 discounted rate plus a "mom's play free" special - which would reduce a twosome to $40 pp.  You don't have to play with your mother - you just have to play with a mother.  So two females would work or male and female as long as one was a mom.  The issue will be if there are an odd number of players or 8 males and only 3 females.  I'm not sure how this will work out logistically and won't know until we get confirmed reservations - but in any scenario its a great deal.  

This event did require a credit card so I would need to have any cancellations by Friday, May 6th so I could cancel in time.  

Any questions or if you need to reach me please call 339-224-1377.

Hope to see you there,

Cindi

 

The following is a blurb from their email:

 Free Golf for Mom’s on Mother’s Day

This year treat your mom and yourself on Mother’s Day.  Pinehills Golf Club is pleased to offer complimentary golf for mom’s on Mother’s Day-Sunday, May 8th.  The offer is this easy: each paying customer is entitled to bring one “mom” and she plays for free.  Tee times will go fast so reserve early.  Tee times MUST be reserved through the golf shop by calling 508-209-3000 ext 20 beginning April 28th.

 Spring Rates Still in Effect:

 Spring rates are in effect through May 13th.  Come play the only two 5 star public golf courses in New England for $60 Monday-Friday and $80 Saturday & Sunday.  All prices include cart and range balls.
item.how_to_find_us: At the clubhouse 15 minutes prior to T time
item.why: Special Rates as low as $40 pp with cart and range balls - see below

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Pinehills Golf Course
